body.p:
To his Excellency the
Govenor of Kentucky
Sir.

We the undersigned would most earnestly beg your Excellency's to pardon Mrs Lucinda Bennett. now confined in the Penetentiary, under a sentence, for the crime of advising negroes to escape from their owners.

Her conduct during her imprisonment, has been so good. that the Officers of the Prison. most cheerfully unite with us. in praying, that your Excellency may extend pardon, towards one, (& that one, a woman) who having once done wrong to the laws of the Land. but now humbly sues for pardon.

Signed.
T. W. Hammond. Senator.
Joshua F Bell
F. L. Cleveland
R H Field
Lucinda Bennett has been a well behaved woman Since she has been in Prison

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Lucinda Bennett
